Fyi's: - There's a bar - They have tv's everywhere - Kid friendly (they can color or write on chalk boards) - They have happy hour - Bottomless fries w/ burgers - Burgers are bomb - Steak fries - Upgrade to sweet potato or garlic fries - Try the milkshakes - I don't care for pickles, but the fried pickle appetizer is grub - Lots of sauces (my fav is campfire)

Great service at the Oxnard towne ctr today! Plenty of parking. No wait. Great service. Clean restaurant and restrooms. Our food was good and quick.  Upon entry the host provided my little one with a balloon. My husband was happy to watch the sport game and eat a burger that had an oozing egg.  I think his burger was called the Red Robin, not sure He started to devour it, before I could snap a picture.

Went in just before 11:30am for lunch. Manager (Shannon) and our server (Jeremy) went above and beyond my already high expectations. He sent out refills without us needing to ask. The other servers that brought the food were extremely polite and personable as well. The food as usual was great too (Chili burger and western BBQ burger). Fries were great, our lemonades were great... Honestly, such a great experience. The music even set the perfect tone for our experience. The Format!? Absolutely! Update: I took my son and his friend here for lunch and the kid menus were all in spanish. I asked for an English one so the boys could read the instructions and so forth (I'm not racist) and was told that all they have. A few weeks later, same thing. They only order spanish? The kid menu is awful!!! The toasted cheese sandwiches didn't have flavor. Literally two pieces of bread put into a toaster then cheese put in between. I felt like going to the kitchen and showing them how to properly make a sandwich. I'm sure it's frozen first just like the kid pizza, which was bland and not worth even a dollar.
Have been here a few times and haven't been disappointed. The service is great. As soon as you walk in you are greeted. Food is good love the unlimited fries which are so good.

My husband brought home chili which I've had in the past from Red Robin in Ventura. This was awful. It did not have the topping or even remotely look like is pictured on their site, the taste was lousy and I now have no dinner as it is inedible.You couldn't do less than this.  We will NEVER get food there again.

This place is ok. The food is like any other in Ventura. Service could be worked on but there's lots of options on waiting you can play games on the tablets but you'd have to pay for it or you can go by the restroom and they have chalkboard and chalk for you to draw or play hangman

We have been to several Red Robins around So Cal and this one is noticeably bad by comparison. My Banzai burger had almost no sauce on it (usually it's a messy burger). My wife's BLT Croissant had a stale (hard) croissant and they gave her 4 or 5 french fries. My daughter's Margareta had no salt on the rim and tasted non-alcoholic - they probably forgot to include the tequila. We've visited this location before several times and every time something has happened to disappoint us. The dining room is always noisy (they wouldn't let us in the bar this time) and at 6 pm the glare from the windows was awful. The place is always full of screaming children - it's descending to the level of Chuckie Cheese. The service was attentive this time, but in the past we've been treated pretty badly when we've complained about something. That's it - we've finally given up on this location - we'll go to the one in the Ventura Mall or Thousand Oaks - those are managed much better and it shows.

Do not come to this location. If you are a Ventura country resident, make the drive to the Ventura location. I've been twice and on both occasions the service was absolutely TERRIBLE. Horrible. Will never come here again.

Walked straight into an empty bar. Sat down and waited about 6 minutes (bar tender back and forth) until my BF finally asked who the bartender was. Before this: no greeting, no acknowledgement. Waited another 5 minutes until she finally came to us and asked what we wanted to order. "We don't have menus (nor drinks at this point)." By the end of our meal, 3 other groups sat at the bar. They did not get greeted either. It seems like this bartender was going from the floor and back to the bar. Why would a manager have her working the entire floor + the bar? The food was Red Robin delicious, but the service left a bad taste. Will go back to our usual spot in Ventura. Currently still waiting for our check....

Sat at the bar on Memorial Day, there were about 4 other customers.  Bartender was pretty quick to get my beer and a menu.  I ordered the Southern Charm burger minus the veggies.  I wasn't asked how I wanted it prepared, so what I got was a medium well burger bordering on well done.  If it had been properly cooked it would've been way better, but it was just too dry.  They only offer throw away napkins, which is not good when you have sticky BBQ sauce all over your fingers, the napkin just sticks and comes to pieces.  You would think that a restaurant in The Collection would use proper napkins.  The overall service was good, but the cons outweigh the pros here.  Way better places in this area to get a burger.

Me and some buddies came to this Red Robin on a Thursday night. We were seated right away and our waitress was prompt to help us out and got our orders in right away. It took almost an hour and a half to get our food to the table (only 3 burgers), at that point I just wanted to go home. I recommend you stay away if you don't want to be waiting around for your food.

I have been coming back to this place many times since it first opened. The food is good the customer service is great and the atmosphere is family friendly. As a royal reward member they have so many perks like discounts, free burgers on your birthday and much more .... Will continue to enjoy their food both inside their creative decorated dinning room or their outside patio area. Cheers to all the waiters who have cared for us many times with great customer service. And the manager who welcomes us and stops to say hello and interact with us.

Out of the places in the collection me and my GF decided to go with the "Gourmet Burger" place. First off this was on a Wednesday night 740pm. We were sat fairly quick maybe 5-8mins. When we sat down we took our time to really choose the right burger that sounded best to both of us. Our sever was great BTW, we were sat in the big room to the right, from the looks of things there was only 2 servers in this area 1 host.  Now for the food, I got the BBQ burger with normal steak fries, the fries looked as if they were on there last life and had no flavor to them. The fries were warm only on the inside which leads me to believe that they were prolly sitting for a while. This was prolly cause the the sever was out running all her own food. My burger was warm but didn't taste fresh at all. I still ate it because I was starving at this point.  Now the second burger and fries was the Mac and Cheese burger with sweet potato fries. My GF went straight for the fries which is what any normal fry lover would do. Fries were completely cold, I mean as if they were sitting in the car on a 30 min drive home cold. Biggest disappoint of the night. After begging my GF to at least take a bite of the burger she did and it was nice and hot and fresh maybe the saver of the night but not enough to ever want to come back. After letting the manager know how we felt he apologized and informed us of a party of 20 in the other room and he was in the kitchen cooking. It sounds to me like the floor management and kitchen personal may have all been let go way to early, our 10.99 burger was comp'd per "TEEN PARTY" but our night out was ruined.

Since this location opened up I've been here a few times and it was busy however the server was nice and very helpful. The food usually comes out amazingly fresh tasting. However the menu and table this timer were extremely dirty and sticky. We got a dirty dish and when we gave it to another waitress she tried to say that's they way it looks. Overall food was good. Quality was good. Cleanliness can be improved.

Guys, lemme tell you bout Red Robin! Every time I come here it is a delight! All the work staff is super friendly and there is always a manager who checks with every table to ensure we're having a good time. The food is always  ! And who can go wrong with there fries and campfire sauce?!  Honestly my fav place to go out to eat.

My fiancé and I went in for dinner tonight.  My fiancé got Red Robin gourmet burger which he enjoyed, except for the fact that the burger meat tastes frozen.  I got the BBQ Boss burger.  I am very sensitive to spicy foods and because this burger had a campfire mayo, a jalapeño bun and the pulled pork on the burgers sauce I figured was going to be tangy and spicy, I asked our waitress if the burger was spicy and she said no.  The burger was so spicy I started sweating and needed to drink my ice tea after every single bite.  If something has the slightest spiciness to it you should say "it's not spicy to me but could be to you, I recommend... instead".  My garlic fries were alright, not a lot of garlic at all but they were good with ketchup.   We also ordered pretzel bites, they were over cooked, dry and the cheese sauce seemed watered down.  All in all my fiancés burger was good, mine would have been better if it didn't kill my mouth, the flavor was good. Our service was good and the prices were okay.

My first and last time! As soon as you walk in the big blonde guy  gives you an major attitude...like I owe him something. Food was ok, but the whole atmosphere was tensed and gone because of the greeter!

HORRIBLE. Should have believed the other horrid reviews. Food was cold and tasted old. The service was mediocre but it wasn't her fault. They were busy and this place was a joke for service and food quality.
I love Red Robins Pena coladas they are the bomb! My favorite is a chicken sandwich with waffles instead of buns, I can't think of what it's called lol. The servers are always nice.

This place is horrible on customer service. Waited 10 minutes to even be acknowledged by our waitresses. And then she walks off without taking our drink order. They say endless fries but with these workers you'll be lucky to even get another basket of fries before you finish your whole meal. Understaffed, rather drive to Thousand Oaks or ehh Ventura not any better.

The fruit cups for a child side dish was nasty. I would never feed this to my kid. According to the manager the "fresh" cup of fruit is made daily in the mornings. The strawberries are FROZEN, the oranges are canned and the other fruits are cut fresh daily. I am very disappointed and hope Red Robin eventually changes this fruit cup into something more tasty and appealing for the kids. Also, the waitress never came back once we made a complaint. That's not very professional.

location: Naval Construction Battalion Center Port Hueneme, CA
review: My server Jessica was sweet and very good but the food blows. Over priced, fries were cold and I pay 5 bucks for a bottomless rootbeer float and they give me a huge cup and like 2 bites of ice cream. And it takes at least 5 minutes to get a refill. Seriously avoid this shithole

My family I recently visited this place after my kids requested it.   I have never been a fan of this place and this oxnard location confirmed why.  First of all, computer ordering at the table.  There is nothing personal about computer ordering. That's not real costumer service.  Second, the food was mediocre.   Two teen age boys didn't even finish there burgers.  My wife's Cobb salad was sad.  She usually orders a Cobb salad from BJs restaurant and there is no comparison, BJs Cobb salad is superior. French fries were cold and when we complained of the cold fries, the manger came out and stated that the fries were in fact fresh. Well I disagreed.  I'm an adult and I known what fresh fries taste like.  Overall, very disappointed with the lack of service and quality of the food.  $72 dollars later and I wish I had gone to subway.  What's worse is that you pay by computer and they recommend a 20% tip lol. Yeah right, who am I tipping the computer.  Tips are for people who serve and take orders.  Not computers. Never going back to this place.  Stay away people.

Super disappointed at the service. Took over half an hour to get our food on a slow Monday night. Mind you, my partner and I only ordered the garlic fries...When we finally got them, they were bland and portions were ridiculously small.  P.S. Watch out for that ENTERTAINMENT FEE, they add on your check!

My family and I really love red robin but I have to say the new one at the collection has the worst service and the few times we have been there out order was wrong. Ill drive to venturas location for better  service.

Sticky tables, have to ask for refills on water, fries came cold and sad and over heat lamped. Just tried to get new fries since first batch was so sad.... 30 minutes later we just payed our bill and left. I used to love Red Robin  not this one
This is a good Robin location. They treated us great, we were served quick  The food was good hot and fresh. I've been here before and I'll be back, like The Governator!

The burgers were ok, not great, just ok. I think in and out is better. The service was slow. The bottomless fries were pretty ridiculous,  just a bit of fries with your meal ( mainly burnt) . When I asked for more fries, the server forgot to bring them. My boyfriend asked again,  yet they never arrived.  Then we asked for more fries for him... got forgotten as well. Had to flag someone down to get our check ( the check out thing at the table would not print, and though we pressed the call button, no one showed up) All in all, not worth the money. Will not be returning.

Awful from start to finish. We were coldly greeted by the hostess who sat us at a DIRTY table. I asked for a different table because the seats were dirty and there was trash and food on the floor all around the table. The hostess rolled her eyes and said sure. We ordered and the waitress kept coming and asking us if we were doing ok (at least 3 times before our food arrived). It took 30 minutes for our food to arrive. The entire restaurant is dirty and everyone who works there looks depressed and unhappy.  I bet this Red Robin will be closing soon.  We will never waste our money here again. Restaurant manager if you are reading this you need to invest in training your employees. They have no people skills or serving abilities.  They were more interested in talking to one another than serving.
My server Lydi was great! Food was good. I'll definitely come back. Manager was courtesy. Great experience overall.
Great staff here. On top of things kind and professional. It's not that common these days so it's much appreciated.

Called in a to go order. Waited 45 minutes and the restaurant was slow. Jeremy the bartender was cordial and eventually announced that the kitchen was backed up and started passing around free fries! Good customer service acknowledging what was going on! Unfortunately I got home opened my salad and was very disappointed my lettuce was brown! Maybe they were having an off night!

Took around 45 minute to get a burger  Crying kids on the side near the restaurant  Management said he was short staffed and could have made it a more pleasant experience yet nothing was offered  Don't think I will ever be back here

We like to sit at the bar for great quick service. The drinks are strong and the burgers are delicious. Bottomless fries are an added bonus and there are lots of tvs in the bar area! Staff is friendly and accommodating. It took a little longer to get our food out but our bartender was on top of everything.
AWESOME server, AWESOME food. I got the Banzi burger. Great time with my family. Manager came by often to check on us. Our server brought us what we needed before we asked. We will be back.

I've been to this location before however this time was a different experience. A horrible experience. First off the food was super late. And then they messed up the order (ordered burger with no cheese). They offered to remake our boca burger and 20 minutes later they brought it with a frozen patty! And then the manager came and offered to give us back our original burger and that they would scrape the cheese off. I can't believe they would even hold onto the burger. Gross. This is beyond bad customer service. It is unacceptable to serve undercooked food to patrons. This place should be closed down. Last time I will visit this location.

the service was terrible.  Food quality is not worth the amount that you are paying.  I told the server no relish and my burger came back with relish and our cheese sticks were frozen in the middle.  I will never come back to this location.

Really bad service. We had the worst experience. Two servers for a lunch shift? Completely under staffed. We asked to speak to the manager and she never came to our table we had to get up and leave. Never coming back that is ridiculous.

Love the crispy chicken salad. Ordered a side of donuts. The donuts tasted ok. The girl who took my payment was extremely friendly, professional and thoughtful. This was a call in order. So who ever took the call kept making immature comments. I had no idea what he was even saying and I asked the girl who handed me the food. She said that was separate from the restaurant. He was strange. And I felt as if he was making a fool out of me. 5 stars for the restaurant but a straight zero for the call center.
Waited over an hour and a half after a 45 minute wait to be seated and receive cold food a manager came over and asked who is unhappy here I'll definitely be back.. what a joke..

Service is horrible at both locations in Oxnard and Ventura. Food is just mediocre burgers are okay and the quote unquote free refills of french fries are ridiculous you get about 6 steak fries each time and if you are even able to ask her server for a refill if they come back to the table at all.

Wish I could give 0 stars. Do NOT come to this Red Robin unless you like bad service. Go to the one up the street at Pacific View Mall instead. We waited 20min without even getting a our drink order taken before we walked out.  It was not busy and there was plenty of staff. The wait staff seems more interested in gossiping with each other and pretending to stay busy than actually helping their customers.  Stay Away!

Took my nieces here after a movie. We waited for over an hour for our food and once our waitress took our order and brought us drinks we never saw her again. I ended stopping a waiter to ask what the wait was and he said oh another 15 minutes. Meanwhile people around us where being served by different staff. I would have left but I was waiting for my car to be ready from being serviced at the dealer. I like Red Robin BUT they really need to do a better job to ensure the staff at least  checks on tables. Oh and they were not even busy!!!

Nicer restaurant for American food  Just like any outer burger place  The menu is very nice to understand and can see lot of pic else you have like small iPad you can see everything from the menu there The service is good  but I not understand Samthing  How them say Friday night the whiting time is 40 min  But in the door 5 employees stand in the welcome desk ? - weird ! And 50% from the table is empty ?  Whatever the food is just ok  I like the vibe  But old if I go again this long time for no reason

So disappointing !! We came here and expected to be treated equally or at least good service manager was horrible with his service and so was the host walked by a couple times without acknowledging us .. after waiting for about 20 min in our table for some type of service we left.
